channel.title: Error 508 Help! - still need help plz post for a bump:P
channel.description:
I am using Windows 7 Using a 508 Server Enviromentment Variables [code] CLASSPATH C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin [/code] [code] PATH C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin [/code]
[code] @echo off title Starting... echo. echo Now starting Drowning508... Please wait... echo. cd ../bin title Drowning508 - ONLINE "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause [/code]
Error pops up as
[code] Now starting Drowning508... Please wait...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: palidino76/rs2/Server
Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Tryed both "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 and C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
I have copy'd my [code]Java Files [/code] in to both my Program Files and Program Files (x86)

item.title: Error 508 Help! - still need help plz post for a bump:P
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Okay saying
my server.class file
is located here
C:\Games\Drowning508\bin\palidino76\rs2
What would i be saying in my Run.bat?

And I Vain I can you please unblock me? from PM’s
Sorry about a PM earlier - Forgive me Please i need your help

I tryed to send this to you but it said i was blocked

Read full topic

item.title: Error 508 Help! - still need help plz post for a bump:P
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

[quote=“Sphiinx, post:4, topic:373410”]try copy and pasteing this , this is the 1 i use

@echo off
@TITLE Rune-Isle Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Cheers Sphiinx[/quote]

javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac <options> <source files>
use -help for a list of possible options
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Error 508 Help! - still need help plz post for a bump:P
item.dc:creator: @Sphiinx Sphiinx
item.description:
@Sphiinx wrote:

try copy and pasteing this , this is the 1 i use

@echo off
@TITLE Rune-Isle Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Cheers Sphiinx

item.title: Error 508 Help! - still need help plz post for a bump:P
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

I am using Windows 7
Using a 508 Server
Enviromentment Variables

CLASSPATH
C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin
PATH
C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin
@echo off
title Starting...
echo.
echo Now starting Drowning508... Please wait...
echo.
cd ../bin
title Drowning508 - ONLINE
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause

Error pops up as

Now starting Drowning508... Please wait...

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: palidino76/rs2/Server

Press any key to continue . . .

Tryed both
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
and
C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594

I have copy’d my

Java Files in to both my Program Files and Program Files (x86)
